metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2911 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: If the `recursive-clients` quota is reached on a BIND 9 resolver configuredwith both `stale-answer-enable yes;` and `stale-answer-client-timeout 0;`,a sequence of serve-stale-related lookups could cause `named` to loop andterminate unexpectedly due to a stack overflow. This issue affects BIND 9versions 9.16.33 through 9.16.41, 9.18.7 through 9.18.15, 9.16.33-S1through 9.16.41-S1, and 9.18.11-S1 through 9.18.15-S1.

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
